Content: Crippling Blow deals additional <font color='#CD1F1F'>piercing damage</font> to disabled targets.
Blitz Attack applies Vulnerable to targets hit. Vulnerable lasts until the end of your turn, and deals a one-time amount of bonus damage on hit.
Battering Ram has a 25% chance to apply Dizzy for 1 turn.
Crippling Blow applies Sundered, reducing max Physical and Magic Armor by 25%.
Battle Stomp creates a localized quake at the point of initial impact, dealing bonus damage in a 3m radius.
